summary: Change the damage magnification of Legendary difficulty.
descriptionHtml:
Change the damage magnification of Legendary difficulty. This MOD can change "time scale" and "cell respawn", "clear cell respawn", "corpse time", "vendor items respawn time". And can add gold to vendor's basic possession gold(not console : ref additem f xx).

=======Required==================================
SKSE v1.7.03
SkyUI v5.1

=======Installation=================================
Put in the data folder.

=======Uninstall===================================
New game.

=======Note=======================================
Items that have a checkbox, the settings are saved when the checkbox checked.
You avoid to fight with bandits chief and elder dragons if you set 15 times dealt damage(maximum setting). Because you will be killed instantly.
==================================================

SKSE Team, SkyUI Team, thank you for great MOD!
author: gekkou1992
